disclosures.label: Warranty
disclosures.text: This software is provided AS IS, without any expressed or implied warranty.

disclosures.label: Voice
disclosures.text: We don't have the redistribution licence, but you could copy SLVoice or SLVoice.exe, libortp.dylib or ortp_x64.dll, and libvivoxsdk.dylib or vivoxsdk_x64.dll from SL viewer's Resources folder to Megapahit's Resources or libexec folder. But on macOS, don't copy the files before you launch the app for the first time, otherwise GateKeeper would consider the app tampered after failing to verify its integrity.

disclosures.label: Privacy
disclosures.text: The viewer sends data only to Second Life.

disclosures.label: Accounts
disclosures.text: Our Bugzilla may require an account made, but you are not required to make any in order to use the viewer.

disclosures.label: Performance improvements
disclosures.text: Faster Zoom In, and especially Apple GPU and vertex buffer optimisations, by observeur.

disclosures.label: Bug fixes
disclosures.text: The macOS bug fixes that were introduced in 7.1.9.51085 are now here too.

disclosures.label: Bug fixes
disclosures.text: The bug fixes especially for GNU/Linux that were introduced in 7.1.9.51085 are still only here.

disclosures.label: Other differences
disclosures.text: Apart from the improvements found in 7.1.8.50941, this release includes updates from the SL viewer Maintenance B.
